attributes.review: This app literally ruined my whole day I was looking for stupid to do and this took first place honestly this was such a waste of time I’m never doing this again 😫😩🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢💩💩💩💩

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app will steal your house ,I went to McDonald’s and when my cat drove me back my lego house was gone all that was left was Batman, the scene was traumatizing, Robins head was in my dogs mouth and Superman was decapitated.

attributes.title: Gen Z ✊🏽
attributes.review: Every time I open this app, I kicked me out immediately. I feel so hurt and oppressed by this. This app needs to be taken down because It really affects a lot of people.

attributes.title: Horrible, horrible app
attributes.review: It took all my data and shut down all my devices. Phone, tablet, laptop, TV, air conditioner... How am I supposed to watch the news?!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: The president’s a joke, the app does not function properly, not a single thing is good about the app, it should be removed from the App Store immediately.

attributes.title: my grandma died
attributes.review: this app made my grandma pass away!!!! i downloaded it and left it sitting in the chair next to my grandma. she looked at my phone and instantly went insane. she started jumping up and down and acting like a monkey. we took her to a mental hospital and she was diagnosed with monkey disorder. she soon passed away after swinging so hard on a tree branch that she passed out and fell 30ft to her grave

attributes.title: Stole my information😤😠
